Author: Confucius
QuoteNote: He who learns but does not think, is lost. He who thinks but does not learn is in great danger.

Author: Jim Rohn
QuoteNote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.

Author: Micheal Sokoya
QuoteNote: You were born to make an impact.

Author: FrankLin D. Roosevelt
QuoteNote: A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.
